verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> lu-Lei If יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> she-Ha-yah been לָ֑נוּ La-nu; יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> yo-mar- say נָ֝א <S%H4994><s%> na now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. who was on our side now may Israel

לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> lu-Lei If יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> she-Ha-yah been לָ֑נוּ La-nu; בְּק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> be-Kum rose up עָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu against אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. who was on our side when men

אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> 'A-zai Then חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim quick בְּלָע֑וּנוּ <S%H1104><s%> be-la-'U-nu; they had swallowed us up בַּחֲר֖וֹת <S%H2734><s%> ba-cha-Rot was kindled אַפָּ֣ם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pam when their wrath בָּֽנוּ׃ Ba-nu.

אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> 'A-zai Then הַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim the waters שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ <S%H7857><s%> she-ta-Fu-nu; had overwhelmed נַ֝֗חְלָה <S%H5158><s%> Nach-lah, us the stream עָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var had gone over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu. our soul

אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> 'A-zai Then עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var had gone over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu; our soul הַ֝מַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, waters הַזֵּֽידוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H2121><s%> haz-Zei-do-Nim. the proud

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [be] the LORD שֶׁלֹּ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shel-Lo has not נְתָנָ֥נוּ <S%H5414><s%> ne-ta-Na-nu who hath not given טֶ֝֗רֶף <S%H2964><s%> Te-ref, us [as] a prey לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8127><s%> le-shin-nei-Hem. to their teeth

נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu, Our soul כְּצִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> ke-tzip-Por as a bird נִמְלְטָה֮ <S%H4422><s%> nim-le-Tah is escaped מִפַּ֪ח <S%H6341><s%> mip-Pach out of the snare י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים <S%H3369><s%> yok-Shim of the fowlers הַפַּ֥ח <S%H6341><s%> hap-Pach the snare נִשְׁבָּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> nish-Bar, is broken וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃ <S%H4422><s%> nim-La-te-nu. and we are escaped

עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ <S%H5828><s%> 'Ez-re-nu Our help בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem [is] in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, who made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz. and earth
